# Data Source: aws_networkmanager_global_networks

Retrieve information about global networks.

## Example Usage

```python
# DO NOT EDIT. Code generated by 'cdktf convert' - Please report bugs at https://cdk.tf/bug
from constructs import Construct

#
# Provider bindings are generated by running `cdktf get`.
# See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.
#
from imports.aws.data_aws_networkmanager_global_networks import DataAwsNetworkmanagerGlobalNetworks

    def __init__(self, scope, name):
        super().__init__(scope, name)
        DataAwsNetworkmanagerGlobalNetworks(self, "example",
            tags={
                "Env": "test"
            }
        )
```

## Argument Reference

* `tags` - (Optional) Restricts the list to the global networks with these tags.

## Attribute Reference

This data source exports the following attributes in addition to the arguments above:

* `ids` - IDs of the global networks.
